name: Nameless King
description: Story-driven fantasy action game built in Godot using GDScript, developed over 2 months for a game jam hosted by UoAGDG. Led the project, overseeing design, development, and implementation of core mechanics.

name: Ouroboros
description: Horror-heavy 2D story game built in Godot over 2 days for Kiwijam, a weekend game jam focused on rapid game development. Acted as project manager and contributed to development.

name: Caesar Cipher Webapp
description: My first React web app, built as part of COMPSCI 215 to encrypt and decrypt text using the classic Caesar cipher algorithm. Designed a simple interface for easy cipher interaction.

name: Advice Generator App
stack: Node.js - React - Typescript - REST API - TailwindCSS
description: A simple web app built for a Frontend Mentor challenge. Generates random advice using the Advice API. Implemented the given design with a focus on functionality.
